game.name: Nomën Ipsa
game.genres: 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, RPG, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 멀티플레이어, MMO, 협동, 온라인 협동, 카메라 움직임 조정, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정
game.shortDescription: Hardcore, retro-styled RPG focused on boss fights with interesting mechanics. Demanding. At times grind-y. There are leaderboards to climb! You can team up with your friends (so they can call you useless when you inevitably miss a mechanic), or go solo. Your call, play however you want.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Hardcore, retro-styled RPG focused on boss fights with interesting mechanics. Demanding. At times grind-y. There are leaderboards to climb! You can team up with your friends (so they can call you useless when you inevitably miss a mechanic), or go solo. Your call, play however you want.
